definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)

sentences.english: Around the farm many trees are planted to protect the crops from strong winds .
sentences.chinese: 農場四周種植了許多樹木，以保護莊稼免受大風吹襲。

sentences.english: The wall shelters the house from the north wind.
sentences.chinese: 這垛牆阻擋北風吹襲房屋。

sentences.english: The boat heeled over in a strong wind.
